text: (visvasavantayini!) obat mese pavasanu: “allahvada apata pahala karana lada (mema dharmaya)da ibrahim, ismayil, ishak, yakub adintada movunge paramparavatada pahala karana lada siyallada, musatada, isatada, laba denu læbu dæyada, anit nabivarunta ovun deviyan vetin laba denu læbu dæyada, api visvasa karannemu. ovungen kisivekut (nabivarun nova yayi) api venkara noharinnemu. tavada ohutama api sampurnayenma avanata vemu”
